name: Super Auto Crusaders
description:
Super Auto Crusaders

The fastest auto battler on Ludum Dare! Are you the champion of strategy, who can beat their opponents in mere 10 seconds?

How to play

The gameplay consists of 3 looping phases, each lasting only 10 seconds:

- 👇 Placement: Place your fighters on the board

- 🏹 Battle: Let them fight

- 🆙 Upgrade: Get more units or buff the existing ones

Play with your mouse, click on units to pick them up and set them down. During upgrade phase, click on either a new unit or an upgrade to choose it.

You will play against teams made by other players, win by beating 5 teams in ten seconds, lose even a single time and you will have to start again. Running out of time is not an issue, you can try again in the next phase.

Known issues

For some reason, fonts don’t render properly on Mac + Firefox - try using Chrome if you’re on Mac. Sorry for the inconvenience!
